item.title: 聚焦：欧洲各国政府争相解读特朗普的新药品定价令
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发布降低美国药品价格的行政命令后，欧洲各国政府正在研究美国总统唐纳德-特朗普是否可以迫使它们为处方药支付更多费用，这激怒了全球制药业。【原文：European governments are examining whether U.S. President Donald Trump can force them to pay more for prescription medicines, after he issued an executive order to lower U.S. drug prices, roiling the global pharmaceutical industry.】

item.title: 早间竞价：贸易协议有望达成，市场接近平衡点
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，特斯拉董事会为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克探讨新的薪酬协议
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，特斯拉董事会已经成立了一个特别委员会来探讨首席执行官埃隆-马斯克的薪酬问题，这可能会导致他获得新的一揽子股票期权。【原文：Tesla's board has formed a special committee to explore CEO Elon Musk's pay, which could lead to him being offered a fresh package of stock options, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚交易所运营商就可能裁员启动咨询程序
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所运营商澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）周三表示，该公司已开始就可能的裁员进行磋商，因为在监管压力不断增加的情况下，该公司正加大力度降低成本。【原文：Australian stock exchange operator ASX said on Wednesday it had begun consulting on potential job cuts as it ramps up efforts to lower costs amid mounting regulatory pressure.】

item.title: 索尼今年利润持平
item.description: 索尼公司周三表示，预计在截至今年 3 月的财年中，营业利润将增长 0.3%，达到 1.28 万亿日元（约合 87.0 亿美元）。【原文：Sony said on Wednesday it expects operating profit to rise 0.3% to 1.28 trillion yen ($8.70 billion) in the financial year ending in March.】

item.title: 加密货币平台 FalconX 与渣打银行合作
item.description: 加密货币主经纪商 FalconX 和全球银行渣打银行周三表示，他们已结成战略合作伙伴关系，为机构加密货币投资者提供服务。【原文：Crypto prime broker FalconX and global bank Standard Chartered said on Wednesday they had formed a strategic partnership to serve institutional crypto investors.】

item.title: 投资者考虑关税休战，股市微涨，美元挣扎
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市上扬，美元则摇摆不定，原因是相对温和的美国通胀数据为美联储今年晚些时候降息的前景提供了支撑，尽管投资者仍在衡量贸易冲突最糟糕的时期是否已经过去。【原文：Stocks edged up in Asia on Wednesday while the dollar wobbled as relatively benign U.S. inflation data fed into prospects of rate cuts by the Federal Reserve later this year even as investors were still gauging if the worst of the trade conflicts was over.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：百度准备在欧洲推出无人驾驶出租车
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，中国科技巨头百度正准备首次在欧洲测试其无人驾驶打车服务 Apollo Go。【原文：Chinese technology giant Baidu is preparing to test its driverless ride-hailing service, Apollo Go, in Europe for the first time, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 2030 年代初全球钴市场将从过剩转为短缺
item.description: 钴研究所（Cobalt Institute）周三在一份研究报告中称，钴需求的增长速度将快于供应的增长速度，这将使市场在未来几年减少2024年的过剩，并在2030年代初转为短缺。【原文：Demand for cobalt will rise faster than supply, allowing the market to reduce the 2024 surplus in coming years and swing to a deficit in the early 2030s, the Cobalt Institute said in a research on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第一季度工资增长 0.9%，略高于预期
item.description: 周三的数据显示，在政府为护理人员加薪的带动下，澳大利亚三月份的工资有所增长，而私营部门的增长乏力则表明，劳动力市场的紧张状况仍然不能阻止降息。【原文：Australian wages picked up in the March quarter led by government pay rises for care workers, data showed on Wednesday, while subdued growth in the private sector suggested a tight labour market was still no bar to a cut in interest rates.】

item.title: 美国通胀降温导致美元下滑，贸易谈判在即，美元企稳
item.description: 美元在隔夜创下逾三周以来最大跌幅后于周三企稳，美国消费者通胀数据不及预期，在全球贸易紧张局势降温之际支持了美联储的宽松政策。【原文：The U.S. dollar stabilised on Wednesday following its biggest decline in more than three weeks overnight, with softer-than-expected U.S. consumer inflation data bolstering the case for Federal Reserve easing just as global trade tensions cool.】

item.title: 韩国帮助受关税影响的中小型企业
item.description: 韩国政府周三表示，韩国已为预计将受到美国关税伤害的中小型企业准备了支持措施。【原文：South Korea has prepared support measures for small and medium-sized firms expected to be hurt by U.S. tariffs, the government said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍德赛德公司与沙特阿美公司签署协议，可能收购路易斯安那州液化天然气股份
item.description: 澳大利亚伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）周三表示，该公司已与阿美石油公司（Aramco）达成了一项不具约束力的协议，以探索各种机会，包括该沙特阿拉伯公司可能收购路易斯安那液化天然气项目的股份。【原文：Australia's Woodside Energy said on Wednesday it had entered a non-binding agreement with Aramco to explore opportunities, including the Saudi Arabian company's potential stake acquisition in the Louisiana LNG project.】

item.title: 贸易战缓和，美元走软，油价维持在两周高位附近
item.description: 周三早盘，油价维持在两周高点附近，这主要是受中美两国达成暂时降低互惠关税的协议以及美元下跌的支撑。【原文：Oil prices held near two-week highs in early trading on Wednesday, supported by an agreement between the U.S. and China to temporarily lower their reciprocal tariffs and a falling U.S. dollar.】

item.title: 以色列 eToro 公司寻求在规模更大的美国首次公开募股中筹集高达 6.2 亿美元的资金
item.description: eToro 集团周二表示，该公司计划在美国首次公开募股（IPO）中筹集约 6.2 亿美元，定价高于市场区间。【原文：eToro Group is planning to raise around $620 million in an upsized U.S. initial public offering (IPO) priced above market range, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚起诉麦格理证券虚报卖空交易
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构周三表示，已开始对麦格理证券（澳大利亚）（MSAL）采取法律行动，指控该公司在超过 14 年的时间里误导性地报告了数百万笔卖空交易。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Wednesday it had started legal action against Macquarie Securities (Australia) (MSAL), accusing the firm of misleadingly reporting millions of short sales for over 14 years.】

item.title: 三星电子将以 15 亿欧元收购 FläktGroup
item.description: 三星电子周三表示，已同意以 15 亿欧元（16.8 亿美元）的价格从欧洲投资公司 Triton 收购德国空调和供暖系统制造商 FläktGroup 的全部股份。【原文：Samsung Electronics said on Wednesday that it has agreed to acquire all shares of FläktGroup, a German maker of air conditioning and heating systems, for 1.5 billion euro ($1.68 billion) from European investment firm Triton.】

item.title: 研究发现：尽管贸易受阻，4 月份全球电动汽车销量仍有所增长
item.description: 周三的数据显示，4月份全球电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车销量同比增长29%，其中中国和欧洲在贸易紧张局势下仍保持稳定增长，而北美则出现了自去年9月以来的首次下滑。【原文：Global sales of electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles rose 29% year-on-year in April, with stable growth in China and Europe despite trade tensions, while North America recorded the first fall since last September, data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 解说：中国芯片设备制造业的发展现状
item.description: SiCarrier 是一家与华为关系密切的中国芯片设备制造商，其计划推出的产品范围之广引起了轰动。【原文：SiCarrier, a Chinese chip equipment maker with close links to Huawei, has created a stir with the breadth of its planned product range.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称华为芯片合作伙伴 SiCarrier 寻求 28 亿美元融资
item.description: 与华为关系密切的中国芯片设备制造商 SiCarrier 正在其首轮融资中寻求 28 亿美元的资金，两位熟悉该计划的人士表示，这家初创公司正在寻求更多的客户和影响力。【原文：SiCarrier, a Chinese chip equipment maker with close links to Huawei, is seeking $2.8 billion in its maiden fundraising round, two people familiar with the plans said, as the startup chases more clients and clout.】

item.title: 贝恩资本退出澳大利亚 Insignia 公司的收购竞争
item.description: Insignia Financial 周三称，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）已退出对这家总部位于澳大利亚的财富管理公司的竞购，理由是全球资本市场动荡不安。【原文：Insignia Financial on Wednesday said Bain Capital has pulled out of making a binding bid for the Australia-based wealth management firm, citing volatility in global capital markets.】

item.title: 因沙特芯片交易股价大涨，英伟达首席执行官净资产接近 1200 亿美元
item.description: 本周二，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋的个人净资产从去年的 800 亿美元跃升至约 1 200 亿美元。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's personal net worth jumped to around $120 billion on Tuesday, up from $80 billion last year, as a boom in demand for the company's artificial intelligence chips has powered a steep rally in its shares.】

item.title: 受人工智能服务器需求影响，富士康第一季度利润有望强劲增长
item.description: 台湾富士康是全球最大的合约电子制造商，预计将于周三公布第一季度利润跃升 72%，原因是人工智能服务器的需求持续强劲。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, is expected to report on Wednesday that first-quarter profit leapt 72% on continued strong demand for artificial intelligence servers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级银行 CBA 第三季度现金利润增长，利润率稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）周三公布，受贷款量增长和交易收入增加的帮助，第三季度现金收益上升。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia reported a rise in third-quarter cash earnings on Wednesday, helped by growth in lending volumes and higher trading income.】

item.title: 乌克兰副总理表示，乌克兰已完成与美国达成矿产交易的步骤
item.description: 乌克兰第一副总理周二表示，乌克兰已完成与美国达成的矿产开采协议的执行程序，包括投资基金的运作。【原文：Ukraine has concluded procedures for implementation of a deal with the United States on exploiting minerals, including the operation of an investment fund, the country's first deputy prime minister said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西努班克第一季度调整后净利润增长 37
item.description: 经营巴西数字贷款公司 Nubank 的上市实体 Nu Holdings 周二公布，其调整后净利润同比增长 37%，略低于分析师的预期。【原文：Nu Holdings , the listed entity which runs Brazilian digital lender Nubank, posted on Tuesday a 37% increase in its adjusted net profit from a year earlier, slightly missing analysts' estimates.】

item.title: 巴西 JBS 公司第一季度盈利 5.21 亿美元
item.description: 全球最大的肉类加工企业 JBS 周二公布，第一季度净利润为 29.2 亿雷亚尔（5.21 亿美元），符合分析师预计的 29.2 亿雷亚尔实际净利润，年增长率近 78%。【原文：JBS , the world's largest meatpacker, on Tuesday reported a net profit of 2.92 billion reais ($521 million) in the first quarter, in line with analysts' estimates of a 2.92 billion real net profit and a nearly 78% annual increase.】

item.title: 交易日：没有 "贸易休战 "宿醉，狂欢仍在继续
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 佛蒙特州州长暂停电动汽车要求
item.description: 本周二，佛蒙特州州长菲尔-斯科特（Phil Scott）暂停了该州对乘用车、中型和重型卡车的电动汽车销售要求，因为人们对加州率先推出的零排放汽车规定的可行性存在更广泛的担忧。【原文：Vermont Governor Phil Scott paused the state's electric vehicle sales requirements for passenger cars and medium and heavy-duty trucks on Tuesday, amid broader concerns about the feasibility of zero-emission vehicle rules pioneered by California.】

item.title: 为挽救拜登的清洁能源税收抵免政策而进行的最后一次游说活动
item.description: 美国能源产业贸易团体在最后一刻发起游说攻势，敦促国会议员在共和党预算计划中不砍掉前总统乔-拜登提出的一系列清洁能源税收抵免措施。【原文：U.S. energy industry trade groups have launched a last-minute lobbying blitz to urge Congress members to spare a slew of former President Joe Biden's clean energy tax credits from the chopping block in the Republican budget plan.】
